short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Schedule the web to read, watch, learn at a more convenient time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to save and read, watch, listen at a more convenient time to you. Whilst browsing the web just copy and paste the url and schedule it at a more convenient  time.
